title: Kuching High Court rules Petronas’ RM7.95 mln bank guarantee demand on Petros valid (Video)
desc: KUCHING (Feb 25): The High Court here has ruled that Petroliam Nasional Berhad’s (Petronas) demand for a bank guarantee of RM7.95 million from Petroleum Sarawak Berhad (Petros) was valid. Judge Datuk Farids Gohim Abdullah held that Petros had failed to prove that the call on the bank guarantee was either unconscionable or unlawful. On constitutionalRead More

title: Trump sets record for longest State of the Union speech
desc: US President Donald Trump delivered the longest-ever State of the Union address, beating former president Bill Clinton's record of one hour and 20 minutes.
